items.name: Opened Iron Trapdoor
items.description: Places a stable vertical iron trapdoor, no redstone needed!

items.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster
items.description: Every status effect for 2 seconds. Gives "A Furious Cocktail" and "How Did We Get Here?" advancements.
